description: The Rumchata Eggnog cocktail is a&nbsp;delicious spin on the traditional holiday drink. With rum, milk, and heavy cream, it's sure to warm your heart during wintertime! Makes for an excellent party drink alongside some cookies and pies if you're looking to treat yourself while indulging in this favorite seasonal beverage too.
name: Rumchata Eggnog
recipeIngredient: ¼ tsp. Nutmeg, plus more for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a large saucepan, whisk egg yolks and sugar to combine.
recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan, whisk egg yolks and sugar to combine.

recipeInstructions.name: Add milk, nutmeg, cinnamon, and vanilla, and turn on the heat to medium-low. Cook for about 10 minutes, or until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon. Make sure not to boil.
recipeInstructions.text: Add milk, nutmeg, cinnamon, and vanilla, and turn on the heat to medium-low. Cook for about 10 minutes, or until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon. Make sure not to boil.

recipeInstructions.name: Remove the pot from heat. Whisk in the cream and Rumchata. Refrigerate until well chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pot from heat. Whisk in the cream and Rumchata. Refrigerate until well chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Transfer into glasses and garnish with cinnamon sticks and nutmeg.
recipeInstructions.text: Transfer into glasses and garnish with cinnamon sticks and nutmeg.
